PageContents.PageContent: <Content HeaderText="HAMPI, Stone Chariot" DescriptionText="UNESCO World Heritage Site, will take one to good old golden days." ImgURL="../assets/img/slide1/1.jpg" ImageIndex="TOUR_1" Active="true"/> <Content HeaderText="Aihole, 4th Century Monument" DescriptionText="Well known archeological site near to other ASI sites Pattadakal and Badami" ImgURL="../assets/img/slide1/2.jpg" ImageIndex="TOUR_2" Active="false"/> <Content HeaderText="Karwar, Enjoy the peacefull beach walk " DescriptionText="Third largest naval base near to Goa and Dandeli" ImgURL="../assets/img/slide1/3.jpg" ImageIndex="TOUR_3" Active="false"/> <Content HeaderText="Kodachadri, 10th Highest Peak Of Karnataka" DescriptionText="Experience the dense forest trek, offroad jeep ride and river rafting" ImgURL="../assets/img/slide1/4.jpg" ImageIndex="TOUR_4" Active="false"/>

<Content HeaderText="Kudremukha, 3rd Highest Peak Of Karnataka" DescriptionText="Kudremukh National Park is well known for it's flora and fauna" ImgURL="../assets/img/slide2/1.jpg" ImageIndex="TOUR_1" Active="true"/> <Content HeaderText="Bagalkot, 4th Century Monument" DescriptionText="Well known archeological site near to other ASI sites Pattadakal and Badami" ImgURL="../assets/img/slide2/2.jpg" ImageIndex="TOUR_2" Active="false"/> <Content HeaderText="Kambala, Heritage of Kundapura" DescriptionText="We respect our culture and we want you to taste it" ImgURL="../assets/img/slide2/3.jpg" ImageIndex="TOUR_3" Active="false"/> <Content HeaderText="Melkote, Rayagopura" DescriptionText="A historical monument with easy access from Mysore , Hassan or Shrirangpatna " ImgURL="../assets/img/slide2/4.jpg" ImageIndex="TOUR_4" Active="false"/>

<Content HeaderText="RequestServiceSuccessText" DescriptionText="Hey! [@FULLNAME@], Thanks
Your request is at out desk
Keep this reference number [@TRAVELREFERENVENUMBER@] and Will reach you soon.
Thank You" /> <Content HeaderText="RequestServiceFailureText" DescriptionText="We failed to serve your request
Could you please try after some time
Thank You" /> <Content HeaderText="ConatctServiceSuccessText" DescriptionText="Hey! [@FULLNAME@], Thanks
We have recieved your contact request
keep this reference number [@TRAVELREFERENVENUMBER@] and Will reach you soon.
Thank You" /> <Content HeaderText="ConatctServiceFailureText" DescriptionText="We failed to capture your request
Could you please try after some time
Thank You" />

Content.DescriptionText: Dear [@FULLNAME@], We would be very happy to serve your [@REQUESTTYPE@] - [@VEHICLE@] request on [@TRAVELDATE@] and we would confirm you the same in a while. Please feel to reach us on [@DOMAIN@] or [@CONTACTUSPHONE@]. Your reference number - [@TRAVELREFERENVENUMBER@]. Thank You, Dhyan Travels - we drive your dreams

Hurry Admin, We have a [@REQUESTTYPE@] - [@VEHICLE@] request on [@TRAVELDATE@] from [@CAB_FROMPLACE@] to [@CAB_TOPLACE@] for [@FULLNAME@]. Reach him on [@PHONENUMBER@] with reference - [@TRAVELREFERENVENUMBER@]

Hurry Admin, We have a [@REQUESTTYPE@] - [@VEHICLE@] request for [@TRIP_NUMBEROFDAYS@] days for [@FULLNAME@] to visit [@TRIP_PLACES@]. Reach him on [@PHONENUMBER@] with reference - [@TRAVELREFERENVENUMBER@]

Dear [@FULLNAME@], We would be very happy to serve your [@REQUESTTYPE@] request for [@TRIP_NUMBEROFDAYS@] days and we would confirm you the same in a while. Please feel to reach us on [@DOMAIN@] or [@CONTACTUSPHONE@]. Your reference number - [@TRAVELREFERENVENUMBER@]. Thank You, Dhyan Travels - we drive your dreams

Hurry Admin, We have a [@REQUESTTYPE@] - [@VEHICLE@] request for [@TRIP_NUMBEROFDAYS@] days starting from [@TRAVELDATE@] for [@FULLNAME@] to visit [@TRIP_PLACES@]. Reach him on [@PHONENUMBER@] with reference - [@TRAVELREFERENVENUMBER@]

Hurry Admin, We have a [@REQUESTTYPE@] - [@VEHICLE@] request for [@TRIP_NUMBEROFDAYS@] days starting from [@TRAVELDATE@] for [@FULLNAME@] to visit [@TRIP_PLACES@]. Reach him on [@PHONENUMBER@] with reference - [@TRAVELREFERENVENUMBER@]

Dear [@FULLNAME@], We would be very happy to contact you and we do the same in a while. Please feel to reach us on [@DOMAIN@] or [@CONTACTUSPHONE@]. Your reference number - [@TRAVELREFERENVENUMBER@]. Thank You, Dhyan Travels - we drive your dreams
Hurry Admin, We have a [@REQUESTTYPE@] request from [@FULLNAME@]. Please reach them on [@PHONENUMBER@] or [@EMAILID@] with reference - [@TRAVELREFERENVENUMBER@]
